alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:21PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Clark, northeastern Pike, south central Garland, southeastern Montgomery and west central Hot Spring Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 321 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lofton to near Glenwood. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Amity... Lofton... DeGray Lake State Park... Bismarck... Alpine... De Roche... Point Cedar... Pettyview... Bonnerdale... Welsh... Rosboro... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
